TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PipeDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the direction of the pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Anonymous pipes must have a pipe direction of In or Out. A PipeDirection value of InOut is not supported by anonymous pipes because they are defined to be one-way only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection In = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the pipe direction is in.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection InOut = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the pipe direction is two-way.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection Out = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the pipe direction is out.
